name: Cat Pen Panic
description:
Can you make it through ten days of panic in the cat pen?

Throw yourself at the futility of wrangling some adorable felines while their owners are off doing something worthwhile with their time.

Cat Pen Panic offers a short but sweet experience with jazzy tunes and toons.

A fun time for any cat lover!

Includes
  • Fwuffy kitten chaos!
  • Original high resolution art with a neat cartoon style.
  • Scratch marks!
  • A tutorial presented by a dapper cat!
  • Meowing!
  • Groovy tunes sung by cats!
  • 30 minutes of satisfying game play!
Minimum Requirements
  • Windows 10
  • Some kind of GPU
  • Computer mouse
  • A sense of humor
